title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 358-3.6 - Default in payment of assessments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 358-3.6 - Default in payment of assessments

State Regulations

If the agreement filed with the chairman under
subdivision (b) of section 358- 3.4 of this Subpart is the agreement of an
employer, or of an association of employers or an association of employees
authorized to pay benefits, or a trustee or trustees under a plan paying
benefits, the acceptance of the plan shall terminate forthwith on default, after notice, in any payment required to be made to the chairman in accordance
with section
213, 214
or
228
of the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
358-3.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
